message: I propose we divide the $10,000 in a 70/30 split. I believe this is fair considering the diminishing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I'm willing to compromise on a 50/50 split, but I think we can do better than that. I'm hoping you'll consider a more favorable split in the next round.
Considering the inflation and the previous offers, I propose a 60/40 split. I hope this meets your expectations and we can conclude this game.
I'm not convinced that a 60/40 split is fair, given the inflation. I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share, but I think I deserve a bit more than 40%.
